text: Hello, anyone know what the best way to get a deal (or search) based on a property? Meaning find a deal (or deals) that have a property with value x ?
you can read more about it here `<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search>`

Hello everyone! I'm creating backend integration to HubSpot, and i'm absolutely confused why there is no possibility to use `grant type=client_credentials` . Okey, with `authorization_code` i was waiting to recieve get-request from HubSpot oauth service, but there is no coming without user interaction:face_with_rolling_eyes: I will be grateful for any suggestions on how to resolve this.
<@U013DUB8SR3> if you building for specific client or personal use and don't want the user interaction, go with `hapikey` ( i will recommend to use oAuth2 only )

Any examples of extending a cloned site search results module to call the blog post API to get even more information for the search results? I’d like to take the ID from the search results and then call blog post to get the blog post date, author avatar, and more. Thanks! I’m also new to authenticating and pretty much anything with API’s.
